name: sefaria-web
description: Server for rendering React components for Sefaria, a library of Jewish texts.

scripts.daemon: forever start -a -p ./ -l log/forever/forever.log -o log/forever/out.log -e log/forever/err.log -w --watchDirectory log/forever/timeout node/server.js
scripts.build:webpackOld: webpack — config node/webpack-production.config.js — progress — profile — colors
scripts.dev-server: webpack-dev-server — config node/webpack-dev-server.config.js — progress — colors — port 2992 — inline
scripts.hot-dev-server: webpack-dev-server — config node/webpack-hot-dev-server.config.js — hot — progress — colors — port 2992 — inline
scripts.setup: npm install -g nodemon; npm install -g babel-cli; npm install -g forever
